name: FROGGO! (cplusjuice)
description:
This is a game about frog that exploring the space!

Gameplay & features

Basically it's a simple casual tap-to-score game, when you need to explore as much planets as possible. We have couple gamemodes wich usually differ by difficulty and few different space objects (voids/planets with companions). Also during the game you could collect coins that will make you able to unlock different skins and trail through space delivery boxes!

How to play

You have to only use your mouse to click! Game have a tutorial that will not appear after you complete 7 steps of it. Anyway, the point is to jump from one planet to another to get score. You also may get into the void that you have to do opposite thing in - jump out of that. You will face couple different bonuses that may help you during your space travel!

Contribution and info

We do not monetize this game at all yet, since it's not done and couldn't be released in google play yet, so you are free to just download and play it. Any your comments on the game will be really helpful to us, so please leave it!

Game was origianlly designed for android, so we reccomend to play it on that plarform.

btw video for coins exchange button isn't work bc yeahhh....
